  Just registered Gladiator last week (even though I should be 
studying for finals).  Great game, currently taking my team through 
the TevFifty, which btw is extremely well done.  
  Just one major problem that needs to be fixed in future versions:  
my fire elemental is level 26 w/ dex of 250.  He's almost so fast 
that he outruns his own fireballs, which will probably turn extremely 
annoying once he actually CAN outrun them.  That really should be 
fixed.  Physically, it's not even possible.

--Michael
